name: Black Jumper
description:
It's new paradigm on the One - Touch game.

Doesn't move without jump. If you want move, Jump.

Use Short-Jump and Long-Jump move to destination.

* This game isn't move without jump.

[ How to control ]

Short Jump - touch the screen in short time.

Long Jump - touch the screen in long time.

[Special Feature]

To move, Jump only.

[Notes]

Noe easy.

Don't throw your cell-phone.
